TEXT FILE STREAMING LEVELS
% MAP LEGEND:
% -3 = edges of explosion cross
% -2 = connectors of explosion cross
% -1 = center of explosion cross
% 0 = empty space
% 1 = permanent wall
% 2 = bomb
% 3 = breakable crates (with item)
% 4 = spawned enemies
*********************
